channel.title: [Released] My Command Maker. so far.. REQ: .NET 2.0
channel.description:
Coded in C#
well here's how it works so far:
[img]http://img359.imageshack.us/img359/3854/main2md1.png[/img]
[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/346/clickinlisthn3.png[/img]
[img]http://img142.imageshack.us/img142/3251/clickingonbuttonsst7.png[/img]
[img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/6189/messagetoallev4.png[/img]
[img]http://img520.imageshack.us/img520/4474/booleanskg5.png[/img]
Buttons in Commands:
[ul][li]Add Item[/li] [li]Remove Item[/li] [li]Void[/li] [li]Message To All[/li] [li]Add Skill Exp[/li] [li]Teleport[/li] [li]Send Message[/li] [li]Set Animation[/li] [li]Set GFX[/li] [li]Boolean On/Off[/li] [li]Text4[/li] [li]Loop Start[/li] [li]Loop End[/li] [li]Comment[/li] [li]Empty Line[/li] [li]Custom Code[/li][/ul]
Download: [url=http://www.zshare.net/download/5174530077bd7d96/]Here[/url]
gonna add more stuff

item.title: [Released] My Command Maker. so far.. REQ: .NET 2.0
item.dc:creator: @buckeys9 buckeys9
item.description:
@buckeys9 wrote:

this looks like a very good command maker :D…and looks like a successful one also ;D, i bet many ppl could use it even me but is this only for 317’s or 508’s+525’s or even 513???

item.title: [Released] My Command Maker. so far.. REQ: .NET 2.0
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Cow, post:9, topic:243224”][quote author=kevin5475845 link=topic=319545.msg2532201#msg2532201 date=1226528214]
Better now?

Generated Code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("test") && playerRights > 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner")) { addItem(995, 10000); teleportToX = 3656; teleportToY = 3596; aVoid(); tested = true; }
[/quote]
… It still fails…[/quote]

I’m not so used to code in Java… and if you really think it fails so could you tell what’s wrong and i may fix.

also

~Kyle:

Lulz. You spelt “amount” wrong…

you spelled “spelled” wrong…

Read full topic
